title: Our Favorite Jon Pardi Memories + Lunchbox Shares A Performance from his Acting Class + Bobby’s Mailbag: Boyfriend Loses BUNCH of Money on Super Bowl…How To Break it To Girlfriend
itunes:title: Our Favorite Jon Pardi Memories + Lunchbox Shares A Performance from his Acting Class + Bobby’s Mailbag: Boyfriend Loses BUNCH of Money on Super Bowl…How To Break it To Girlfriend
description:
Jon Pardi was supposed to be in the studio today but he got sick. So instead, we shared our favorite Jon Pardi memories from over the years. Lunchbox brings in a new piece of audio from his acting glass. They are acting out a scene from the movie Clue and we are even more suspicious of him being scammed now. Inside of Bobby’s Mailbag, a listener needs help on how to tell his girlfriend that he lost a bunch of money on the Super Bowl and now can’t afford to take her out for their anniversary.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
